DOC.brief_summary: With the use of Non invasive ventilation the patients with cystic fibrosis will have better lung function (FEV1).
DOC.brief_title: Non Invasive Ventilation as Airway Clearance in Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: 3 months intervention between PEP an Bilevel. The patients will follow up under 3 months.
DOC.criteria: Patients with CF older than 18 years FEV1 between 20% and 69% of predictive. No acute exacerbation. No Burkhordelia Cepacia/MRSA colonization. Children under 18 year acute exacerbation.
